alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 5:42AM CDT until June 10 at 1:39PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Texas... Sweetwater Creek at Kelton 5N affecting Wheeler County. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Kelton 5N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Kelton 5N. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water overflows both banks. Cattle in flood plain are threatened and should have easy access to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...Rise to 13.2 feet around mid day and then fall below action stage this evening. - Action stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 145 PM CDT.
